events.name: Russian Drone Attacks on Kyiv
events.wd_description: At least four people were killed, and several others injured, as Russia launched a barrage of Iranian-made "kamikaze" drone attacks on Kyiv, with Ukrainian forces responding by shooting down many of the drones.
events.description: At least four people were killed, and several others injured, as Russia launched a barrage of Iranian-made "kamikaze" drone attacks on Kyiv, with Ukrainian forces responding by shooting down many of the drones.

events.name: Drone Attacks
events.wd_description: Russia launched a series of Iranian-made "kamikaze" drones targeting Kyiv, resulting in the deaths of at least four people and setting off warning sirens across the city.
events.description: Russia launched a series of Iranian-made "kamikaze" drones targeting Kyiv, resulting in the deaths of at least four people and setting off warning sirens across the city.

events.name: Ukrainian Response
events.wd_description: The Ukrainian Air Force and security forces destroyed 37 drones and three cruise missiles, including 36 out of 42 drones launched by Russia on Monday.
events.description: The Ukrainian Air Force and security forces destroyed 37 drones and three cruise missiles, including 36 out of 42 drones launched by Russia on Monday.

events.name: Casualties and Rescues
events.wd_description: Four people were killed, four injured, and 19 trapped individuals were rescued from the debris following the drone attacks in Kyiv.
events.description: Four people were killed, four injured, and 19 trapped individuals were rescued from the debris following the drone attacks in Kyiv.

events.name: Russian Missile Strikes Cause Blackout in Kharkiv
events.wd_label: Russian Missile Strikes Cause Blackout in Kharkiv
events.wd_description: A wave of Russian missile strikes targeted energy stations across Ukraine, causing a blackout in Kharkiv. Despite the damage, electricity was partially restored, and air defenses intercepted most of the missiles.
events.description: A wave of Russian missile strikes targeted energy stations across Ukraine, causing a blackout in Kharkiv. Despite the damage, electricity was partially restored, and air defenses intercepted most of the missiles.

events.name: Missile Strikes on Energy Stations
events.wd_description: Russian forces launched 76 missiles and drone attacks targeting energy stations across Ukraine, with significant damage reported in Kharkiv.
events.description: Russian forces launched 76 missiles and drone attacks targeting energy stations across Ukraine, with significant damage reported in Kharkiv.

events.name: Blackout in Kharkiv
events.wd_description: The missile strikes caused a blackout in Kharkiv, affecting power supplies to a large portion of the city's residents and the northeastern region.
events.description: The missile strikes caused a blackout in Kharkiv, affecting power supplies to a large portion of the city's residents and the northeastern region.

events.name: Restoration Efforts
events.wd_description: Local officials and emergency services worked to restore electricity, successfully restoring power to 55% of Kharkiv's residents and 85% in the region.
events.description: Local officials and emergency services worked to restore electricity, successfully restoring power to 55% of Kharkiv's residents and 85% in the region.

events.name: Air Defense Response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian air defenses intercepted 60 of the 76 missiles fired by Russia, with most of the intercepted missiles being cruise missiles.
events.description: Ukrainian air defenses intercepted 60 of the 76 missiles fired by Russia, with most of the intercepted missiles being cruise missiles.

events.name: Xi Jinping's Statement on Taiwan During Party Congress
events.wd_label: Xi Jinping's Statement on Taiwan During Party Congress
events.wd_description: During the opening of China's 20th Party Congress, President Xi Jinping reiterated China's stance on Taiwan, stating that while China strives for peaceful reunification, it does not renounce the right to use force.
events.description: During the opening of China's 20th Party Congress, President Xi Jinping reiterated China's stance on Taiwan, stating that while China strives for peaceful reunification, it does not renounce the right to use force.

events.name: Xi Jinping's Statement
events.wd_description: President Xi Jinping stated that the resolution of the Taiwan issue is up to the Chinese people, emphasizing that China will strive for peaceful reunification but will not rule out the use of force.
events.description: President Xi Jinping stated that the resolution of the Taiwan issue is up to the Chinese people, emphasizing that China will strive for peaceful reunification but will not rule out the use of force.

events.name: Taiwan's Response
events.wd_description: Taiwan responded by asserting that it would not compromise on its sovereignty, freedom, or democracy, rejecting China's claims over the island.
events.description: Taiwan responded by asserting that it would not compromise on its sovereignty, freedom, or democracy, rejecting China's claims over the island.

events.name: Ongoing Tensions
events.wd_description: Tensions between China and Taiwan, heightened after U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's visit, continue with military activities in the region, though at a reduced pace.
events.description: Tensions between China and Taiwan, heightened after U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's visit, continue with military activities in the region, though at a reduced pace.

events.name: U.S. Efforts to Bolster Lithium Battery Production
events.wd_label: U.S. Efforts to Bolster Lithium Battery Production
events.wd_description: The Biden administration is pushing to bolster the U.S.'s lithium battery production capabilities to reduce reliance on foreign supply and increase energy self-sufficiency.
events.description: The Biden administration is pushing to bolster the U.S.'s lithium battery production capabilities to reduce reliance on foreign supply and increase energy self-sufficiency.

events.name: National Blueprint for Lithium Batteries
events.wd_description: The National Blueprint for Lithium Batteries outlines plans to invest in the lithium supply chain from mining to production, aiming to increase energy self-sufficiency and reduce reliance on foreign supply.
events.description: The National Blueprint for Lithium Batteries outlines plans to invest in the lithium supply chain from mining to production, aiming to increase energy self-sufficiency and reduce reliance on foreign supply.

events.name: Domestic Lithium Production Challenges
events.wd_description: The U.S. faces challenges in expanding domestic lithium production, including limited current production, reliance on foreign supply, and environmental and political hurdles.
events.description: The U.S. faces challenges in expanding domestic lithium production, including limited current production, reliance on foreign supply, and environmental and political hurdles.

events.name: Investment and Innovation Initiatives
events.wd_description: The Biden administration has announced investments and initiatives to boost domestic lithium production, including grants and partnerships with industry stakeholders.
events.description: The Biden administration has announced investments and initiatives to boost domestic lithium production, including grants and partnerships with industry stakeholders.

events.name: Li-Bridge Partnership
events.wd_description: Li-Bridge is a public-private partnership aiming to align the federal government's vision with the private sector to build the lithium supply chain and address bottlenecks.
events.description: Li-Bridge is a public-private partnership aiming to align the federal government's vision with the private sector to build the lithium supply chain and address bottlenecks.

events.name: Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: The blueprint includes plans to develop greater recycling capabilities to capture more useful battery minerals and achieve 90% recycling of consumer electronics, EV, and grid-storage batteries by 2030.
events.description: The blueprint includes plans to develop greater recycling capabilities to capture more useful battery minerals and achieve 90% recycling of consumer electronics, EV, and grid-storage batteries by 2030.

events.name: Innovative Battery Technologies
events.wd_description: Researchers are developing batteries with fewer critical minerals and alternative formulations to meet demand and reduce reliance on scarce resources.
events.description: Researchers are developing batteries with fewer critical minerals and alternative formulations to meet demand and reduce reliance on scarce resources.
